about_the_game:
This is a puzzle game with strong random elements that specializes in farting situations.

There are no direct depictions of excrement, genitals, or anus. However, I do show my butt.

Make your way to the toilet without anyone noticing your fart.

The numbers written on the bubbles are at the level of farts,The number written on passersby is the "notice count".

When you pop a bubble and let out a fart, the numbers for that level will be changed to those around you.

It will be subtracted from the "notice count".

In other words, if you fart a lot or have a loud fart.

This means that it will be easier for passersby to notice you.

・Colored bubbles will coalesce and become larger.

・When the bubbles touch the orange border line,Your stomach will be compressed and you will let out a loud fart.

・Hold down the "RUN" button to walk fast. however,The bubbles will come out faster while you are walking briskly.

・The speed at which bubbles come out increases every 50m.

・When there are no passersby, it's your chance. Let's release it all at once.

There are 3 characters. The single picture seen at Game Over/Game Clear differs depending on the character.

*Please feel free to use live commentary and distribution. If possible, please paste the URL of this page in the video description field.

*This game is a remake of the free game "FART BUBBLE" that was released on another site in the past. The single picture that can be seen on the stage of the character "Soul" is now the same as the one in the free game. please note.

highlighted.name: 乙女の尊厳は守られた！

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit adult content.
All characters appearing in the game are over 20 years old.
Some illustrations include nude characters.
There is a depiction of defecation, but there is no direct depiction of excrement.
There are also no depictions of genitals.

detailed_description:
This is a puzzle game with strong random elements that specializes in farting situations.

There are no direct depictions of excrement, genitals, or anus. However, I do show my butt.

Make your way to the toilet without anyone noticing your fart.

The numbers written on the bubbles are at the level of farts,The number written on passersby is the "notice count".

When you pop a bubble and let out a fart, the numbers for that level will be changed to those around you.

It will be subtracted from the "notice count".

In other words, if you fart a lot or have a loud fart.

This means that it will be easier for passersby to notice you.

・Colored bubbles will coalesce and become larger.

・When the bubbles touch the orange border line,Your stomach will be compressed and you will let out a loud fart.

・Hold down the "RUN" button to walk fast. however,The bubbles will come out faster while you are walking briskly.

・The speed at which bubbles come out increases every 50m.

・When there are no passersby, it's your chance. Let's release it all at once.

There are 3 characters. The single picture seen at Game Over/Game Clear differs depending on the character.

*Please feel free to use live commentary and distribution. If possible, please paste the URL of this page in the video description field.

*This game is a remake of the free game "FART BUBBLE" that was released on another site in the past. The single picture that can be seen on the stage of the character "Soul" is now the same as the one in the free game. please note.
name: FART BUBBLE DX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Memory: 330 MB RAM
  • Storage: 225 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
